text: Ron Hibbert (24 March 1924 – 8 December 1996) was an Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * *Profile on Collingwood Forever Category:1924 births Category:1996 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players
title: Ron Hibbert
